an auction is finalized, no further interactions should be possibleauction is finalized when either the end time is reached or all tokens are sold","params":{"auctionId":"The ID of the auction being interacted with"}}],"AuctionNotActive(uint256)":[{"details":"This can occur if trying to buy after the auction has ended","params":{"auctionId":"The ID of the auction being interacted with"}}],"AuctionNotEnded(uint256)":[{"details":"The auction can only be finalized after its scheduled end time","params":{"auctionId":"The ID of the auction being interacted with"}}],"InsufficientTokensAvailable()":[{"details":"The requested purchase amount must not exceed the remaining tokens"}],"InvalidDuration()":[{"details":"The auction duration must be greater than zero"}],"InvalidKickerRewardPercentage()":[{"details":"The kicker reward percentage must be between 0 and 100 inclusive"}],"InvalidPrices()":[{"details":"The start price must be strictly greater than the end price"}],"InvalidTokenAmount()":[{"details":"The total token amount must be greater than zero"}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{},"title":"Dutch Auction Errors","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"AuctionAlreadyFinalized(uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when trying to interact with an auction that has already been finalized"}],"AuctionNotActive(uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when trying to buy tokens outside the active auction period"}],"AuctionNotEnded(uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when trying to finalize an auction before its end time"}],"AuctionNotFound()":[{"notice":"Thrown when the auction has not been found"}],"InsufficientTokensAvailable()":[{"notice":"Thrown when trying to buy more tokens than are available in the auction"}],"InvalidAuctionToken()":[{"notice":"Thrown when the auction token is invalid"}],"InvalidDuration()":[{"notice":"Thrown when the auction duration is set to zero"}],"InvalidKickerRewardPercentage()":[{"notice":"Thrown when the kicker reward percentage is greater than 100%"}],"InvalidPaymentToken()":[{"notice":"Thrown when the payment token is invalid"}],"InvalidPrices()":[{"notice":"Thrown when the start price is not greater than the end price"}],"InvalidTokenAmount()":[{"notice":"Thrown when the total number of tokens for auction is zero"}]},"kind":"user","methods":{},"notice":"This contract defines custom errors for the Dutch Auction
